title: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: short / java.lang.StackOverflowError
body: ### PanacheEntityResource dont work properly when TherapyElementEntityResource is exposed this issues occures. an other issue is an stack overflow: some PanacheEntityResource work others dont they are pretty much the same can you please have a look ðŸ‘€ ? when exposed: ``` The stacktrace below has been reversed to show the root cause first.
